entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You collected enough egg sacks so that Entha can extract and manufacture an artificial scent that will drive nesting mothers away from Mos Eisley. Entha is pleased and the Mayor is pleased that Entha is no longer complaining.
entries.journal_entry_description: The mite populations are out of control. They are laying their eggs all around town. However mites will not lay eggs in the same area as another rockmite nest. Entha wants you to get egg sacks for rockmites and return them to her. She will then extract and manufacture the scent that warns other mites away from the area. With that artificial scent she can mark the surrounding territory and drive the nesting mothers further away from Mos Eisley.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Entha is trying to drive the rockmite population away from their nesting grounds around the city, by spraying those areas with an artificial scent. She wants you to collect egg sacks so she can synthesize that scent. You can find rockmites in the infested areas in the hills around Mos Eisley.
entries.task02_comm_message_text: Great job. Entha is off my back for the first time in a bantha's age. Come back and we can finish our business.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Talk to the Mayor about what he owes you for helping out Entha.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Try looking here for some rockmites.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Try looking here for some rockmites
